nodes.excerpt: Movies are the best, but unfortunately there are a lot of movies that contain scenes some of us would rather not see. ReelCalm is a community based app designed to identify those harmful triggers in movies, so that those with past trauma can watch in peace.

nodes.title: QuotaPath + HubSpot integration - Calculate earnings & attainment from HubSpot deals

nodes.excerpt: Worksphere is workplace management software for companies offering employees options to work in-office or remote. Worksphere automates desk booking, safe entry, and gives you office usage data to right-size your workplace.
nodes.title: Worksphere - Software to manage your flexible workplace

nodes.excerpt: PeachPay empowers creators and freelancers to convert their passion into income, and start accepting payment quickly through our simple and accelerated checkout method.
nodes.title: PeachPay - Convert your passion into income
nodes.author: Ben Lang

nodes.excerpt: Lizard is an online guessing and trick-winning card game for up to 6 players. Your goal is to pick a number and win exactly as many times as you said you would. Not more, not less. Use special cards and rules to ruin your opponents.
nodes.title: Lizard - Online card game for up to 6 players
nodes.author: Murat Kemaldar
